Keywords: Assassin , Black Order , Cosmic , Minions of Thanos , Ruler , Warrior
Real Name: Gamora
Special Powers
MY FATHER'S RESOLVE: Once per turn, when Gamora, Daughter of Thanos rolls a single d6, she may reroll it.
PERFECTLY BALANCED: Blades/Claws/Fangs. When Gamora, Daughter of Thanos uses it, you may instead deal half the d6 result to the target. If you do, heal Gamora, Daughter of Thanos or an adjacent friendly character a number of clicks equal to the halved result.

October 26, 2022
pokolo
She’s very great if she had traited Super Senses along with that Reroll a single d6 trait. Might have to team her up with WotR Daredevil and equip her with the Bracelet’s
June 14, 2022
Oathful
This Gamora, while fairly boring to play in my opinion, does her job very well. The sustain she has for 125pts is really what makes her stand out, allowing her to win slap fights with people many points more than her simply by outlasting them if you get good B/C/F rolls. I recommend running Carnage Symbiote on her, being able to reroll her Shape Change and healing even more off of kills makes her much harder to put down. Thematic: 6.5/10 Viability: 9/10 Fun Factor: 7/10, leans towards competitive
June 6, 2022
RockyRaccoon
[QUOTE=dasaul29;12197927]I would assume she can also use her trait for leadership or her willpower roll, which could come in useful. Also, there is cheap equipment that can grant her shape changes and super senses.[/QUOTE] Only equipment that grants SS is WW Bracelets and that only succeeds on 6. But there are a couple modern age figures that grants shape change.

I would assume she can also use her trait for leadership or her willpower roll, which could come in useful. Also, there is cheap equipment that can grant her shape changes and super senses.
May 15, 2022
Goop
Well it would have been nice if she had super senses, impervious or shape change so she could utilize that dice reroll defensively too. As she sits you are really only going to use it for the BCF or if you fail your hypersonic breakway roll. I get very nervous when i see hypersonic with no range. She feels a bit overcosted to me, especially after she falls off those first 3 clicks. Definitely better at her lower line.
